option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Configuration status="WARN"> <Appenders> <Console name="ConsoleAppender" target="SYSTEM_OUT"> <PatternLayout pattern="%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%t] %-5level %logger{36} - %msg%n"/> </Console> <File name="FileAppender" fileName="logs/app.log"> <PatternLayout pattern="%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%t] %-5level %logger{36} - %msg%n"/> </File> </Appenders> <Loggers> <Root level="info"> <AppenderRef ref="ConsoleAppender"/> <AppenderRef ref="FileAppender"/> </Root> <Logger name="org.example" level="debug" additivity="false"> <AppenderRef ref="ConsoleAppender"/> </Logger> </Loggers> </Configuration>
